column4: is there a way to check if a port is open on my pc or should i say in my router?
sudo apt-get install nmap and then nmap localhost
or if you dont like commandline, nmapfe is the gui app
ty

sorry was on the phone

just a reg port scan, nmap -v 127.0.0.1
